text: Epiphany is a Christian holiday or festival on January 6. It celebrates the revelation of the Christ child to the Gentiles, when the Magi ("wise men") visited Bethlehem to see Jesus, by following a star. It is recorded in the Gospel of Matthew, chapter 2. Epiphany is included in the Christmas time. ==Related pages== * Bible * Judea * Holy Land * Christmas * Christianity * Roman Empire * Second Temple ==Other websites== Category:Christianity Category:Christian holidays Category:January observances
title: Epiphany (holiday)
